name: Mediocre Wave Defence Game
description:
If the game is lagging in the web browser playing the downloaded version is probably better

Gather materials and make turrets to defend you from waves of incoming enemies!

1-2 players                               Press up to join

Controls

Movement - 'WASD',  pick up - 'F',  Interact / throw - 'G'

Movement - 'ArrowKeys',  pick up - '.' ,  Interact / throw - ','

Using one gamepad might work, in which case three people can play at once 

The controls for the a gamepad are: 

Movement - 'DPad',  pick up - 'Button east',  Interact / throw - 'Button north'
